name: imgcompress
description:
ImgCompress

70+ image formats supported.

Offline image compression, conversion, and AI background removal for Docker homelabs.

scripts.bundle-assets: mkdir -p assets/vendor/fontawesome assets/vendor/tippy assets/vendor/popper && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css assets/vendor/fontawesome/ && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts assets/vendor/ && cp node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.min.js assets/vendor/popper/ && cp node_modules/tippy.js/dist/tippy-bundle.umd.min.js assets/vendor/tippy/ && cp node_modules/tippy.js/animations/shift-away.css assets/vendor/tippy/ && rm -rf node_modules
